text: Hianagi afi zagagafamo'za mago'zagama aheno'ma nehanama nehiankna hu'zama eme tamahe hana'ma nehaza vahera, anahukna hu'za eme zamahe hana hugahaze. Ana nehanage'za tamagri ha' vahera maka zamavare'za kina ome huzmantegahaze. Hagi rohu'ma eme tamare'za maka zantamima eri'zama vu'naza vahera, ana zanke hu'za zamagrira rohu ome zamare'za maka zazamia eri'za vugahaze.
